name: ~ BITE SIZE BANDITS ~
description:
For weekly jam #235. Theme: Bandit. https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-235 "Dear you,  I’m afraid this is the end, it is up to you now. It’s your duty to provide for the others, steal enough Lego to build our peoples future. but beware, the bedroom is not safe.
Me" Controls: WASD to move. Shift to sprint . Space bar to jump Credits: Aaron: Programming/Level Design/AI Adam: Modeling/UI Design Ben: Sound Design/Roomba :) Team Name: Bubble Game Studios
